message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  Based on my understanding of its potential benefits to you, I'm confident it's worth at least $1,500,000. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,200,000.  This represents a significant savings for you while still allowing me to achieve a fair return on my investment.  Please consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident you won't find this opportunity elsewhere.
